6 แพลตฟอร์ม Cloud Mining ฟรีและถูกกฎหมายชั้นนำ: สร้างรายได้รายวันโดยไม่ต้องมี Hardware

Leading 6 Free and Legit Cloud Mining Platforms: Earn Daily Without Hardware

1/8/2026//NFTevening
nftmining
AI

Summary

TH

จนถึงปี 2026 การขุดคริปโตในระบบคลาวด์ (Cloud Mining) ยังคงเป็นวิธียอดนิยมในการสร้างรายได้เสริมจากคริปโตเคอเรนซีโดยไม่ต้องใช้ฮาร์ดแวร์หรือความรู้ทางเทคนิคที่แพง บทความนี้แนะนำแพลตฟอร์มการขุดคลาวด์ฟรีและถูกกฎหมาย 6 แห่งที่ช่วยให้ผู้ใช้ขุด Bitcoin และสินทรัพย์ดิจิทัลอื่นๆ Hashbitcoin ให้บริการภายใต้การควบคุมของสหราชอาณาจักร มี AI ปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพ อาจทำกำไรได้สูงสุด 5,104 ดอลลาร์ต่อวัน ECOS เปิดบริการในประเทศอาร์เมเนีย มีโปรฟรีทดลอง BitDeer เป็นบริการขุดระดับสถาบัน มีโปรโมชั่นฟรีตามฤดูกาล StormGain อนุญาตให้ขุด Bitcoin บนมือถือโดยไม่เสียค่าบริการ NiceHash เป็นตลาดขุดแบบยืดหยุ่น มีเครดิตฟรีสำหรับผู้ใช้ใหม่ และ Binance Pool เป็นบริการที่เชื่อถือได้จาก Binance สำหรับผู้ใช้ที่มีความเชี่ยวชาญต่างๆ นั้นแต่ละแพลตฟอร์มมีคุณสมบัติที่แตกต่างกันเพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการที่หลากหลาย

EN

By 2026, cloud mining remains a popular method for earning passive income from cryptocurrencies without requiring expensive hardware or technical expertise. This article presents six free and legitimate cloud mining platforms that allow users to mine Bitcoin and other digital assets. Hashbitcoin offers UK-regulated services with AI optimization and potential daily earnings up to $5,104. ECOS provides transparent, regulated mining in Armenia with a free trial. BitDeer features institutional-grade facilities with seasonal promotions. StormGain enables mobile-friendly free Bitcoin mining. NiceHash offers flexible mining options with free credits, while Binance Pool provides trusted services backed by the major exchange. Each platform offers different features to suit various needs from beginners to experienced miners.

Key Points

  • Cloud mining offers passive income without hardware requirements
  • Six legitimate platforms provide diverse features for different mining needs
  • All platforms offer free or low-cost entry options including free trials and credits
  • Platforms range from AI-optimized mining to mobile-friendly applications

Article

By 2026, cloud mining remains one of the most popular and convenient ways to earn passive income from cryptocurrencies. No expensive hardware or technical expertise is required—just choose a trustworthy cloud mining provider, and you can start mining Bitcoin or other digital assets with the potential for impressive daily earnings. Some platforms even offer premium contracts that pay up to $5,104 per day. This guide introduces six of the leading free and legitimate cloud mining platforms for 2026. Each platform lets you start earning crypto instantly, often with little or no upfront investment. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced miner, these services offer a range of features to meet different needs. Quick Overview Hashbitcoin : UK-regulated, AI-powered, up to $5,104 daily earnings . ECOS : Transparent, regulated mining in Armenia, free trial and clear contracts. BitDeer : Professional-grade mining facilities with seasonal free promotions. StormGain : Mobile-friendly Bitcoin cloud mining with free mining features. NiceHash : Flexible mining options, free credits for new users. Binance Pool : Trusted platform with free mining credits during promotions. These platforms offer diverse features, from AI optimization and renewable energy to mobile apps and flexible contracts. Let’s dive into the details. 1. Hashbitcoin: UK-Regulated, AI-Driven Cloud Mining Platform Overview: Hashbitcoin is a leading cloud mining platform based in the UK, offering users a secure and reliable mining experience. Powered by the OptiHash AI engine, Hashbitcoin dynamically adjusts mining strategies for maximum efficiency and profitability. The platform uses renewable energy, making it an eco-friendly choice for miners. Key Features: AI Optimization: OptiHash AI engine maximizes mining efficiency and profits. Regulated in the UK: Full compliance with UK financial laws ensures high security and transparency. Renewable Energy: Hydroelectric, solar, and wind power for sustainable mining. Daily Earning Potential: Premium contracts can yield up to $5,104 daily, making Hashbitcoin one of the most profitable platforms. $15 Free Mining Power: New users get $15 in free mining credits to start mining instantly with no investment. Hashbitcoin is ideal for users seeking cutting-edge AI technology, regulatory security, and eco-friendly mining. 2. ECOS: Transparent, Regulated Mining in Armenia Platform Overview: Operating in Armenia’s Free Economic Zone, ECOS offers a secure, transparent, and regulated cloud mining experience. The platform features a user-friendly interface and clear, structured contracts, making it suitable for both beginners and seasoned miners. ECOS also provides a genuine free trial, allowing users to test the service before investing. Key Features: Free Trial: Start mining with no initial investment. Regulated Operations: Legal framework ensures safety and transparency. Clear Contracts: Easy-to-understand terms with no hidden fees. Renewable Energy: Lower costs and reduced environmental impact. ECOS is perfect for those prioritizing transparency, legal compliance, and ease of use. 3. BitDeer: Institutional-Grade Mining with Seasonal Free Promotions Platform Overview: BitDeer is a globally recognized cloud mining provider offering institutional-grade mining services. With data centers in the US, Europe, and Singapore, BitDeer delivers high-performance mining for both beginners and experts. The platform regularly launches free mining promotions, allowing users to mine without upfront costs during special events. Key Features: Seasonal Promotions: Free mining power during promotional periods. World-Class Facilities: High efficiency and profitability. Global Coverage: Data centers in strategic locations. Multi-Crypto Support: Mine Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies for diversification. BitDeer is a great choice for those seeking professional mining facilities and occasional free mining opportunities. 4. StormGain: Free Mobile Bitcoin Cloud Mining Platform Overview: StormGain is a mobile-friendly cloud mining app that lets users mine Bitcoin directly from their smartphones. Its built-in free mining program can be activated every few hours, allowing users to earn small amounts of Bitcoin with zero upfront investment. The simple interface is perfect for mobile users who want to earn crypto on the go. Key Features: Mobile-Friendly: Supports both Android and iOS. Free Bitcoin Mining: Activate free mining every few hours. No Long-Term Commitment: Flexible, contract-free mining. Trading Tools: Trade Bitcoin and other cryptos within the app. StormGain is ideal for users who want a simple, low-cost way to mine Bitcoin without hardware. 5. NiceHash: Flexible Mining Marketplace with Free Credits Platform Overview: NiceHash offers a flexible mining marketplace where users can buy and sell hash power. The platform supports multiple cryptocurrencies and allows users to choose their preferred mining algorithms. NiceHash also runs promotional campaigns, giving users free mining credits to start mining with no initial investment. Key Features: Marketplace Model: Buy and sell hash power for flexible mining. Free Credits: Promotional periods offer free mining credits. Wide Crypto Support: Mine Bitcoin and various altcoins. User-Controlled Mining: Choose your algorithm and crypto for custom strategies. NiceHash is perfect for users seeking flexibility, free mining opportunities, and portfolio diversification. 6. Binance Pool: Trusted Platform with Free Mining Credits Platform Overview: Binance Pool is the cloud mining service from Binance, one of the world’s largest crypto exchanges. Users benefit from Binance’s robust infrastructure and security. New users often receive free mining credits during promotional events, enabling them to start mining Bitcoin and other coins with no upfront cost. Key Features: Backed by Binance: Reliable platform with strong security. Free Mining Credits: Promotions for new users. Advanced Mining Technology: High efficiency and earnings. Multi-Coin Support: Mine Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies. Binance Pool is an excellent choice for those seeking a reputable platform and free mining credits. Final Thoughts: Which Cloud Mining Platform Is Right for You? Your choice of cloud mining platform should reflect your goals, risk tolerance, and personal preferences. If you want leading AI-powered mining and high daily earnings, Hashbitcoin is the leading pick. For transparency and structured contracts, ECOS is ideal for beginners. If you prefer professional mining facilities and free promotions, try BitDeer . For mobile mining, StormGain offers a simple solution. NiceHash and Binance Pool provide flexibility and multi-coin support, with frequent free mining opportunities. No matter your experience level, these platforms let you start earning crypto instantly—no hardware, no technical barriers. Unlock your passive income potential in the world of cloud mining today!
